name: Astral Assault
description:
Astral Assault is a more dynamic, intensive take on the classic Space Invaders with flashier visuals and a different game progression. The player controls a ship and must battle their way through a series of enemies whom will hound the player and keep them from progressing. The player must actively avoid enemy fire while keeping an eye out for asteroids that contain power-ups and other buffs to help the player survive.

Use WASD to move, spacebar to fire, R to respawn when dead and ESC to pause

Please use fullscreen!
